comments:
Eclipse 20021206

I installed eclipse 20021206 this morning and have been running all day.  I 
have performed multiple self host sessions, but now I can not longer self host.
The following log is generated whenever I try to launch.

I quit eclipse and started it again, same problem.
I removed the .config directory.  No luck.
I rebuilt all projects and I was able to launch eclipse again.


!SESSION ----------------------------------------------------------------------
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.launcher 4 0 Dec 06, 2002 14:52:58.126
!MESSAGE Exception launching the Eclipse Platform:
!STACK
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: 
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.DelegatingURLClassLoader.loadClass
(DelegatingURLClassLoader.java:864)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:445)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.startup
(InternalBootLoader.java:981)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run
(InternalBootLoader.java:834)
	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:462)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:247)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:703)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:539)

Did you do something 'intersting' during the sessions? Did you check out some 
of the core projects in source form?

Wassim, I saw a couple of reports similar to this one. We should investigate 
why selfhosting works OK for a while, then stops (something triggers this).

I had checked out core and ui from head about 8:00 this morning.  Required 
plugins were loaded as binary.  I did not resynchronize with the library during 
the day.

Could not reproduce.  But it seems related to bug 27828, and the latter is now 
fixed.
